text: Josefa "Gigi" Francisco (1954 - 22 July 2015), she was an advocate for the cause of gender equality and rights of women in the Philippines. She help made a lot of programs to lessen the imbalance of gender and also made researches on many aspects of women's equality and their rights. She worked closely with the United Nations on various projects. ==References== Category:Feminists Category:Filipino activists Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Quezon City
title: Josefa Francisco
